```{r, message=F, echo=F, dependson="setup.R"}
library(tidyverse)
set.seed(42)

```

```{r, echo=F}
tibble(
  x = c(rnorm(100, -.8, .25), rnorm(100, .8, .25)), 
  y = rnorm(200, 0, .5)
) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=x, y=y)) +
  geom_point()
```


> The two variables in this plot are:

A) uncorrelated and independent
B) correlated and independent
C) uncorrelated and dependent
D) correlated and dependent
